data.name: Create_Button_Text
data.value: Create
data.comment: Value to be displayed on button when checkbox is unchecked

data.name: Create_Notify_Button_Text
data.value: Create and Notify
data.comment: Value to be displayed on button when checkbox is checked

data.name: Create_View_Failure
data.value: However an issue occurred and the custom view was not created.
data.comment: Failure message for create View

data.name: Edit_Matter_Mandatory_Permission_Level
data.value: Full Control
data.comment: Mandatory permission needed for edit team member

data.name: Error_Assign_Permission
data.value: Assign Permission Failure:
data.comment: Error message when service returns invalid response for assign permission

data.name: Error_Assign_Permission_To_User
data.value: Assign permission to at least one team member
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to enter at least one team member

data.name: Error_Associate_Content_Type
data.value: Associate Content Type Failure:
data.comment: Error message when service returns invalid response for associate content type

data.name: Error_Blocked_Users
data.value: Enter users that are conflicted with this matter.
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to enter users who are conflicted

data.name: Error_Conflict_Check_User
data.value: Please enter users who are not conducting conflict check
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to enter users who are not conducting conflict check

data.name: Error_Conflict_Exists
data.value: A conflict check must be completed prior to provisioning this matter.
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to select if conflict exists for the matter

data.name: Error_Conflict_Reviewer_User
data.value: Enter the conflict reviewers name (for auditing purposes).
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to enter conflict reviewer's name

data.name: Error_Create_Matter
data.value: Error in creation of matter:
data.comment: Error message when service returns invalid response for create matter

data.name: Error_Default_Matter_Type
data.value: Please select primary matter type
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to select default content type

data.name: Error_Duplicate_Matter
data.value: Please enter a different Matter name. A matter with same name already exists.
data.comment: Validation message to check if user has entered a matter name which is already present in the client site collection

data.name: Error_Duplicate_MatterLandingPage
data.value: Landing page of this Matter is already created. Kindly delete existing landing page or please enter a different Matter name.
data.comment: Validation message to check if Matter landing page is already present in the client site collection

data.name: Error_Duplicate_OneNoteLibrary
data.value: OneNote library for this Matter is already created. Kindly delete the library or please enter a different Matter name.
data.comment: Validation message to check if OneNote library is already present in the client site collection

data.name: Error_Edit_Matter_Mandatory_Permission
data.value: Please provide at least one user who has Full Control permission on this matter.
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to select full control permission level for at least one user

data.name: Error_Invalid_Assign_Permission_Users
data.value: Please enter valid users in the Assign Permission users list
data.comment: Validation message to ask users to enter valid users in the assign permission list

data.name: Error_Invalid_Block_Users
data.value: Please enter valid users in Conflicted Users list
data.comment: Validation message to ask users to enter valid users in the conflicted list

data.name: Error_Invalid_User
data.value: Please enter individual who is not conflicted
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to enter valid user in the conflicted user

data.name: Error_Mandatory_Role
data.value: Enter at least one {0} for this matter.
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to select at-least one mandatory role

data.name: Error_Matter_Description
data.value: Enter a description for this matter.
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to enter matter description

data.name: Error_Matter_ID
data.value: Enter a matter ID.
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to enter matter Id

data.name: Error_Matter_Landing_Page_Creation
data.value: Failed to create Matter Landing page, continuing with other steps...
data.comment: Failure message for Matter Landing page not getting created

data.name: Error_Matter_Title
data.value: Enter a matter name.
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to enter a matter title

data.name: Error_Provisioning_Process
data.value: An error has occurred and the matter was not created. Error Code: {0}
data.comment: Failure message in case of any issue while provisioning a matter

data.name: Error_Select_Client
data.value: Select a client for this matter.
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to select the client from the clients dropdown

data.name: Error_Select_Content_Type
data.value: Select matter type by area of law for this matter.
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to select at-least on Area of Law

data.name: Error_Select_Date
data.value: Enter the date on which the conflict check was performed.
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to select the conflict check date

data.name: Error_Select_User
data.value: Enter at least one {0} for this matter.
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to select at-least one user for the selected role

data.name: Error_Share_Matter
data.value: Share Matter Failure:
data.comment: Error message when service returns invalid response for share matter

data.name: Error_Special_Character
data.value: Please enter a valid text which contains only alphanumeric characters, spaces & hyphen
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to enter valid characters in input text. Special characters not allowed

data.name: Error_Stamp_Properties
data.value: Stamp Properties Failure:
data.comment: Error message when service returns invalid response for update metadata

data.name: Error_Valid_Block_Users
data.value: Please enter valid conflicted user from people picker
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to enter valid users in conflicted users list

data.name: Error_Valid_Date
data.value: Please enter the valid date in MM/DD/YYYY format
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to enter the date in valid format. i.e. MM/DD/YYYY

data.name: Error_Valid_Matter_Name
data.value: Please enter a valid Matter name which contains only alphanumeric characters and spaces
data.comment: Validation message to check if user has entered a valid matter name

data.name: Flag_Send_Email
data.value: true
data.comment: Flag to identify whether to send an email or not

data.name: Header_Display_Step
data.value: Step {0} of {1}
data.comment: This is a header that displays the step number that user is currently on out of the total number of steps

data.name: Share_Matter_Failure
data.value: However an issue occurred and the email notification was not sent. Team members will see the new Matter in Search Matter soon.
data.comment: Failure message for share matter

data.name: Special_Character_Expression_Matter_Description
data.comment: Regular Expression for validating matter description

data.name: Special_Character_Expression_Matter_Id
data.comment: Regular Expression for validating matter id

data.name: Special_Character_Expression_Matter_Title
data.comment: Regular Expression for validating matter title

data.name: Success_Matter_Creation
data.value: Matter is successfully created. You can find recently created matter over here.
data.comment: Success message after matter is created in the selected client's site collection

data.name: Success_Matter_Step_1
data.value: Step 1/3: Creating matter library and OneNote library...
data.comment: Success message for Step 1 of 3 while provisioning matter

data.name: Success_Matter_Step_2
data.value: Step 2/3: Assigning permissions to matter library and OneNote library, associating Content Types, creating view and matter landing page...
data.comment: Success message for Step 2 of 3 while provisioning matter

data.name: Success_Matter_Step_3
data.value: Step 3/3: Updating metadata of matter library and sharing matter with the users...
data.comment: Success message for Step 3 of 3 while provisioning matter
